page.title: 08Education
page.content: Our school is a First School. Children start when they are 4 or 5 and go to the Middle School when they are nine. We have 43 children here. There are two classes. The little ones are in one class and the older children in the other one. We use a computer that we play games on to help us learn. We do maths and some of us use Unifix to help us. Sometimes we do writing about what we do at weekends or interesting places we have visited. We also do English, projects, science and art. For P.E. we put on our shorts and tee- shirts. We have skipping ropes, balls, hoops apparatus and mats to roll on. Our latest project is about Indians. We have spelling tests and table tests. School starts at 9 o'clock and we go home at quater past 3. We have dinner in school as well. A man brings it in
